nodes.text: Sometime during the Clone Wars, an intense duel took place in a collapsing satellite city above the planet Duro between Jedi Knight Pablo-Jill and Separatist General Grievous. The duel left Pablo-Jill injured and Grievous stole Pablo-Jill's lightsaber from the floating debris.
The duel over Duro was first mentioned in Star Wars Lightsabers: A Guide to Weapons of the Force, a canon 2018 reference book authored by Pablo Hidalgo.
